__e: The story helps to focus the villagers' thoughts.
If I have the vaccine in my body can't we use it to protect the population?
Two women and three men were an insufficient gene pool from which to build a society.
Most of the population is grateful for our assistance.
But to the people of this district, a great deal.
Where are you planning to sing 'the May song' to the people this year?
I have to get my people to safety.
...it is time to... strike... fear... into...
Now, what is population of island, please?
We propose a celebration for the entire populace of Rome.
All these people from all over the world are calling this place in the middle of nowhere with a population of 42.
And tomorrow... perhaps I'll feed the entire world.
Why, did you know that underneath their clothing, the entire population of the world is walking around completely naked? !
